20110103130500.000|20110103130502.000|TR0|queried by "The Virginia-Pilot" newspaper 
20110103130502.000|20110103130504.000|TR0|which had the videos, the Navy had not 
20110103130504.000|20110103130506.000|TR0|viewed them.  So, they issued a statement

20110103130508.000|20110103130510.000|TR0|created with the intent to offend any one.

20110103130512.000|20110103130514.000|TR0|skits."
20110103130514.000|20110103130516.000|TR0|

20110103130518.000|20110103130520.000|TR0|commander saw the videos, saw what they 
20110103130520.000|20110103130522.000|TR0|were dealing with, ordered an 
20110103130522.000|20110103130524.000|TR0|investigation, and issued a new statement 
20110103130524.000|20110103130526.000|TR0|saying, quote, "Production of videos like 
20110103130526.000|20110103130528.000|TR0|the ones produced four to five years ago 
20110103130528.000|20110103130530.000|TR0|on USS Enterprise were not acceptable then 
20110103130530.000|20110103130532.000|TR0|and are still not acceptable in today's 
20110103130532.000|20110103130534.000|TR0|Navy.  The Navy does not endorse or 
20110103130534.000|20110103130536.000|TR0|condone any of these kinds of actions."

20110103131758.000|20110103131800.000|TR0|$115 extra than people who weren't being

20110103133629.000|20110103133631.000|TR0|the water, do damage to the habitat.
20110103133631.000|20110103133633.000|TR0|
20110103133633.000|20110103133635.000|TR0|ZARRELLA:  The disagreement is clear cut.  
20110103133635.000|20110103133637.000|TR0|The Bureau of Land Management, BLM, is 
20110103133637.000|20110103133639.000|TR0|charged with caring for and managing 
20110103133639.000|20110103133641.000|TR0|nearly 40,000 horses and burros roaming on 
20110103133641.000|20110103133643.000|TR0|26 million acres of the west.  While this 
20110103133643.000|20110103133645.000|TR0|federal land, your land, was set aside for 
20110103133645.000|20110103133647.000|TR0|the horses, they don't have free rein.  
20110103133647.000|20110103133650.000|TR0|The land is considered multiuse.
